original_article.title: Ethereum unlikely to break $3,800 without stronger institutional demand
original_article.summary: Marcel Pechman 25 minutes ago Ethereum unlikely to break $3,800 without stronger institutional demand Ethereum faces weak institutional demand and lacks catalysts, keeping ETH price tied to broader altcoin trends and economic uncertainty. Listen 0:00 438 Market Analysis COINTELEGRAPH IN YOUR SOCIAL FEEDKey takeaways:Ether’s futures and options data signal neutral‑to‑bearish sentiment despite recent price recovery. Institutional ETF outflows and a lack of catalysts keep ETH from breaking $3,800.
